doctor.name: Dr. Nitai Chandra Sarkar
doctor.degree: MBBS, DA, FCPS (Anesthesiology), Fellow Pain Management (India, Thailand)
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Nitai Chandra Sarkar is a Pain Management Specialist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, DA, FCPS (Anesthesiology), Fellow Pain Management (India, Thailand). He is a Associate Professor & Head, Anesthesiology, ICU & Pain Management at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Doctors Clinic, Bogura. Practicing hour of Dr. Nitai Chandra Sarkar at Doctors Clinic, Bogura is Unknown. Please call to know visiting hour.

chamber.visitingTime: Unknown. Please call to know visiting hour

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Nur Alam Nayan
doctor.workplace: Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Nur Alam Nayan is a Pain Management Specialist in Bogra. His qualification is MBBS, BCS (Health), DA (BSMMU), FIPM (Pain Management). He is a Consultant, Anesthesiology at Shaheed Ziaur Rahman Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Health City Specialized Hospital. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Nur Alam Nayan at Health City Specialized Hospital is 3pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday & Saturday).

chamber.address: Yeasin Tower, Sherpur Road, Colony, Bogura - 3500
